text: The Dark Crystal is a 1982 American British dark fantasy movie directed by Jim Henson and first time director Frank Oz. It stars Stephen Garlick, Lisa Maxwell, Billie Whitelaw, Jerry Nelson, Percy Edwards, Roberta Taylor, Barry Dennen and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Official Site * * * Category:1982 movies Category:1980s family movies Category:1980s fantasy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Henson Category:Movies directed by Frank Oz Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about witchcraft Category:Movies about wizards Category:Movies about birds Category:Movies about elves
title: The Dark Crystal
